title: Global workspace theory of consciousness: toward a cognitive neuroscience of human experience.

tldr.text: Functional brain imaging now shows that conscious cognition is distinctively associated with wide spread of cortical activity, notably toward frontoparietal and medial temporal regions, consistent with the GW hypothesis, which is now favored by a number of scientists and philosophers.
